title: Inflation: The Red Band Trailer, Armageddon = Documentary? 09.26.22
itunes:title: Inflation: The Red Band Trailer, Armageddon = Documentary? 09.26.22
description:
In episode 1338, Jack and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by journalist, activist, and comedian, Francesca Fiorentini, to discuss… MSM Looks For Explanation For US Inflation, Interstellar Objects And NASA’s Mission to Redirect An Asteroid and more!

  1. We need to talk about the real reason behind US inflation
  2. Interstellar Objects And NASA’s Mission to Redirect An Asteroid
  3. NASA gears up to deflect asteroid, in key test of planetary defense

LISTEN: Moire by Kenny Beats

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
